#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<iostream>
int main(){
	int n,k,i,j;
	char s[1001], b[1001], x,y;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while( n--){
		int a[27][27]={0};
		scanf("%s%s",s,b);
		scanf("%d",&k);
		while( k--){
			getchar();
			scanf("%c",&x);
			getchar();getchar();
			scanf("%c",&y);
			a[x-'a'][y-'a']=1;
			for(i=0; i< 26; i++){
				if( a[i][x-'a'] == 1 )
					a[i][y-'a'] = 1;
			}
			for( i=0; i < 26; i++){
				if( a[y-'a'][i] == 1 )
					a[x-'a'][i] =1;
			}
			for( i=0; i < 26; i++)
			{
				for( j=0; j < 26; j++ ){
					if( a[i][x-'a'] && a[y-'a'][j] )
						a[i][j] =1;
				}
			}
		}
		i=0;
		if( strlen(s) == strlen(b) )
		for(i=0; i< strlen(s); i++){
			if( s[i] == b[i] || a[ s[i]-'a' ][ b[i] - 'a' ] == 1 )
				continue;
			else
				break;
		}
//		i=0;
		if( i == strlen(b))
			printf("YES\n");
		else printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
